full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
==============================

Reference Number: WS4266930313
-----------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites suppliers to submit a bid for the purchase of one (1) Agricultural Tractor, in accordance with Request for Proposal (RFP) Notice No. E60HS-18AGTR/A.

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   Tender Closing Date: January 25, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: November 17, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: None
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Region of Opportunity: Quebec (except NCR)
*   Region of Delivery: Quebec (except NCR)

**Additional Requirements**
-------------------------

*   Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the request RFSA E60HS-18AGTR/A to be eligible to bid on this contract.
*   The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is the end user of this contract.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For any inquiries related to this tender, kindly contact:

*   Phillipe Schou (TPSGC/PWGSC)
*   Email: <phillipe.schou@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   Phone: (Please note that contact phone number details are not available as it is None)

**Notice and Documentation**
---------------------------

*   The tender description and supporting documentation can be accessed through the Buyandsell.gc.ca website at the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18452945?extsite=MTg0NTI5NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Important Note**
-----------------

It is essential to note that all bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST on January 25, 2024, will be considered non-responsive and may be disqualified.

For more information and to proceed with your bid submission, kindly refer to the provided link and ensure that you meet the eligibility criteria specified in the Notice.
